import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Contacts(){const[contacts,setContacts]=useState([]);const[firstName,setFirstName]=useState('');const[lastName,setLastName]=useState('');const[phone,setPhone]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const[success,setSuccess]=useState('');const[editId,setEditId]=useState(null);const[editFirstName,setEditFirstName]=useState('');const[editLastName,setEditLastName]=useState('');const[editPhone,setEditPhone]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const token=localStorage.getItem('token');// Sécuriser l'accès à la page contacts

const handleAdd=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError('');setSuccess('');try{const res=await fetch('http://localhost:5000/contacts',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json',Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)},body:JSON.stringify({firstName,lastName,phone})});if(res.ok){const newContact=await res.json();setContacts([...contacts,newContact]);setFirstName('');setLastName('');setPhone('');setSuccess('Contact ajouté !');}else{const data=await res.json();setError(data.error||'Erreur lors de l\'ajout');}}catch(_unused){setError('Erreur serveur');}};// Supprimer un contact
